author: rhuijben
msg: (get_proj_sources): Add dependency on the build.conf to the .def file
generation from Visual C++ projects. This fixes added and removed
export headers in build.conf without cleaning the entire workingcopy.

author: rhuijben
msg: Generate Visual C++ project files with Source and Header files filters like
Visual C++ 2002-2008 would do when you created the project files manually
This enhances the development experience in Visual C++ and doesn't change
(get_proj_sources): Add extension property to the returned ProjectItem
instances. Set the extension to '' where we don't have a real file
Generate a 'Header Files' filter containing all headers used by the
project and a 'Source Files' filter containing all other files.

author: hwright
msg: Fix an incompatibility with BSD make, which was introduced in r24293.
Trivial fix. Fixes out-of-tree build of the bindings on BSD.
Might help downstream packagers for these systems.
